abstracts.cdata!:
The Highway Engineering Project consists
            of the following: (a) detailed engineering by consultants of
            about 110 km of roads comprising 73 km of the Al
            Mukalla-Saywun road determined by earlier feasibility
            studies as being of high priority; (b) detailed engineering
            by consultants of 37 km of roads comprising the Ar Riyan Ash
            Shihr road determined by earlier feasibility studies as
            being of high priority; (c) review and amendment of the
            existing detailed engineering for 35 km of the As Said-Ataq
            road also determined by earlier feasibility studies as being
            of high priority; and (d) extension of the technical
            assistance already provided by consultants to the
            Borrower's Public Works Department by a further period
            of 40 manmonths.
